Play
CLUBHOUSE
The Clubhouse provides an energetic club life with live entertainment, creative themes and a full Social Calendar of events. Here you will find the Grille Room, Lounge, Ballroom, Tavern on 18 & Fire Pit Patio with unique al fresco spaces and beautiful views.
GOLF
Our program includes two 18-hole golf courses, North and South, designed by Tom Fazio and limited to 250 members per course. Both courses are grassed with Platinum Paspalum.
SPORTS CLUB
The Sports Club is a hub of activity! From our top-rated tennis program (including 8 Har-Tru clay tennis courts, a Learning Court, an award-winning Coliseum Stadium Court, League Play and lessons) to a world-class fitness center and studio, where members gather daily for fun and fitness. Here you will also enjoy the Spa, sauna, heated lap and lounge pool,  Bocce Garden with 4 bocce courts and 3 leagues, 7 pickleball courts and the Bella Vita (Italian for the “Good Life”) where Lifestyle Clubs gather.
Coming soon! A brand new Sports & Lifestyle Center!
BEACH CLUB
Rounding out Mediterra’s full complement of Southwest Florida’s finest country club amenities is the Mediterra Beach Club on the Gulf of Mexico which recently completed a beautiful renovation. The Beach Club features an elevated heated swimming pool, an expansive sundeck and a restaurant overlooking 200 feet of shoreline with cabana service.
MEMBERSHIP SUMMARIES
Looking for an active full lifestyle focused on Wellness and Friendship with a full complement of amenities unmatched in Naples? Isn’t everyone? Which of these Mediterra Lifestyles is the best fit?
Please note that full Golf and the Limited Golf Program are at cap. 'Sports & Beach Waiting for Limited', 'Sports & Beach' and 'Lifestyle' are available. The wait for full Golf can be avoided by purchasing a resale from a resigning Golf Member. You must be an owner in the Mediterra Community to be a member of The Club at Mediterra.
MEMBERSHIP
"You can’t buy happiness. But you can buy a Membership at Mediterra…and that’s kind of the same thing." -
SAID A VERY SMART PERSON

Wait List for Limited Golf

additional benefits:
